channel.title: Chat Box Icons (need help quick please:))
channel.description:
in my chat box, all icons are fine.. but the donator symbol, doesn't show up.. anyone know how to change that?
thankyou alot. :)

item.title: Chat Box Icons (need help quick please:))
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“mthijs3, post:2, topic:454078”][quote author=Inception-X link=topic=556953.msg4076068#msg4076068 date=1344849447]
in my chat box, all icons are fine… but the donator symbol, doesn’t show up… anyone know how to change that?

thankyou alot.
[/quote]

Check your Sprites map, and make sure the Modicon looking like the donator icon is there.[/quote]
In the cache

Read full topic
item.source: Chat Box Icons (need help quick please:))

item.title: Chat Box Icons (need help quick please:))

item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

[quote=“Inception-X, post:1, topic:454078”]in my chat box, all icons are fine… but the donator symbol, doesn’t show up… anyone know how to change that?

thankyou alot. :)[/quote]

Check your Sprites map, and make sure the Modicon looking like the donator icon is there.
